thread.title: Lakers Name Magic Johnson Team President - WSJ
thread.title_full: Lakers Name Magic Johnson Team President - WSJ

author: Alex Raskin
title: Lakers Name Magic Johnson Team President - WSJ
text:
Lakers Name Magic Johnson Team President The Los Angeles playing legend replaces Mitch Kupchak, the team’s long-time executive; Jim Buss also out By Alex Raskin Feb. 21, 2017 2:26 p.m. ET 
Only two days away from Thursday’s NBA trade deadline, the 19-39 Los Angeles Lakers replaced one of the most successful executives in franchise history, Mitch Kupchak, with one of its greatest players, Earvin “Magic” Johnson. 
Johnson was named the Lakers’ president of basketball operations on Tuesday, the team announced, while Kupchak—a former teammate of Johnson’s in Los Angeles—was relieved of his duties as general manager. ... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
